mods:mods.mods:abstract: Image consists of one rectangular, grey button. A full size black and white image of Dalton McGuinty is provided. On the right side of the button, behind a red background, white text reads:"McGuinty". The text is written in a vertical direction from the bottom of the button toward the top.
